mapper.select: select shipping_address as shippingAddress,recipient_address as recipientAddress, type,remark,courier_size as courierSize ,price from sys_order_sent where order_id=#{orderId}
select shipping_address as shippingAddress,pick_up_position as pickUpPosition, remark,price from sys_order_takeaway where order_id=#{orderId}
select service_description as serviceDescription,remark,price, shipping_address as shippingAddress from sys_order_universal_service where order_id=#{orderId}

select shipping_address as shippingAddress,delivery_time_1 as deliveryTime1, delivery_time_2 as deliveryTime2, pickup_code as pickupCode, remark,courier_size as courierSize,price from sys_order_substitution where order_id=#{orderId}
